entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move to central package management #34638
    10.0.0
  • Upgrade Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* package versions to 4.13.0 #34637
    10.0.0
  • Reading default value from model for decision making #34634
  • Is it possible to add records in the join table with only the IDs? #34629

Closed

  • EntityBuilder: .OnDelete() is ignored if used after .IsRequired() and shadow property #25186
    6.0.1
  • Mixed portion offline expressions #34615
  • SQLite connection fails due to 'e_sqlite3' is not found #34613
  • Scaffold-DbContext: Missing [Name] property for data annotation [Key] and [FillFactor] property is mising for [Index] #34611
  • Is there any possible to add a api when select page data by condition then return value and the total count? #34592
  • Help to detect that a propery is stored in a JSON string #34568

PullRequests

Created

  • Keep actual parameter values out of CommandCacheKey in RelationalCommandCache #34631

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.42.0 to 3.43.0 #34639
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.42.0 to 3.43.0 #34635
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/9.0] Nominally upgrade Microsoft.Build.Framework to 17.8.3 #34636
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Take into account store-generated values when ordering update commands #34626
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34621
